name: Design critique template
description:
Inspired by few resources, this critique board is created to help you improve your remote design critique sessions effectively.


What does the critique board contain:


  • Quick details about the session.
  • Steps to follow up during the session.
  • Section 1: Define the background of the project
  • Section 2: Share your design work 
  • Section 3: Critique synthesis / Follow-up


Hope it will help you all, and please share your feedback/ improvements for thereâ€™s always room for one. 


Thank you :)
